ABSENTEEISM 
In 2010, AEGON companies’ overall absentee	rate 1 stood at 2.0%, a decrease from 2.3% the previous year. Most 
AEGON country units have policies in place to reduce absenteeism, including wellness programs, health check-ups, 
safety training and occupational health facilities. 
 
A total of 292 work-related injuries	and	illnesses	 were reported in 2010, down 11% from the year before. This figure 
covers injuries sustained and reported by employees during the course of their work for the company.
